snippet.title: Monster Hunter Stories - Overview Trailer | Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC
snippet.description:
Ready to become a Monster Rider? Monster Hunter Stories launches on Nintendo Switch, PS4, and PC/Steam on June 14! 
 
With refined graphics, full English and Japanese voice acting, a new Museum mode, and content previously released only in Japan, this is the best way to play the first RPG in the Monster Hunter series. Ride On! 
 
Monster Hunter Stories Official Website: https://www.monsterhunter.com/stories/en-us/
Release Date: June 14, 2024

#MHStories #MonsterHunter

https://discord.gg/capcom
https://www.facebook.com/monsterhunter
https://twitter.com/monsterhunter
https://www.instagram.com/monsterhuntergame/
https://www.youtube.com/monsterhunter
